page.title: 14Local Events.
page.content: Henley. A May Fair is held annually in the Town Square,with stalls and entertainment. Henley is famous for its Royal Regatta, which began with the first University Boat Race in 1829 & the Regatta was formed in 1839.Between 30-50,000 people attend each day.The four day Event ends with a Firework Display.The Henley Festival of Music is held on four evenings in July. Harpsden. Every year,the Women's British Legion organise a Village Fete for Charity. This June,they raised over 2,000 pounds The Event includes Stalls,Fancy Dress, Pet Show,Children's Races,Teas provided by the Women's Institute,a Band & rides on a Penny Farthing.Tudor 500 was held this July at Minster Lovell to mark the end of Richard 111 at Bosworth(1485). Harpsden Juniors took part in costume.
